name: Star Repair Services
description:
The stars keep falling out of the sky and it's up to YOU to put 'em back!  Luckily, you have your trusty S.T.A.R-A.F.F.I.X.E.R (that's probably an acronym) at the ready. 

Left/Right to adjust the launch angle

X to launch a genuine replacement star

Z/C to restart from game-over screen

Successfully placing a star nets you some points and a lil' extra time (that's a timer in the corner)!  And while the timer counts down, you get points for every star just hanging out in the sky, shimmering!  Unfortunately, that Star Affixer isn't cheap so every launch costs you a bit but you should do alright as long as you ease up on it every once in a while.  Good luck-- and you'll get a good look at yr score when the timer runs dry.

--Crafted for #TweetTweetJam 4 using a scant 770 chars--slightly too many.
